channel.title: Any developer interviews or podcasts?
channel.description:
Back in the pre-release days, the BMS team did podcasts like this one: https://www.moddb.com/groups/developer-banter/videos/developer-banter-black-mesa-source
Do they still do podcasts? Would be nice to hear developer banter on the Xen development. Thx!
